{{ album.name }}
import { Component, OnInit, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-artist-albums', templateUrl: './artist-albums.component.html', styleUrls: ['./artist-albums.component.scss'] }) export class ArtistAlbumsComponent implements OnInit { @Input() album: any; constructor(private router: Router) { /*empty*/ } ngOnInit(): void { /*empty*/ } public seeAlbum(album: any): void { this.router.navigate(['/album', album.id]); } }
